title: Classic Herb Seasoning
description: It's as delicious as it is versatile! Wonderful for grilling & roasting- before cooking chicken, pork, fish and shellfish lightly drizzle it with olive oil and sprinkle the Herb Seasoning on. Makes a great addition to your homemade soup and stuffed peppers. The options are endless for this all-purpose seasoning!
cleaned_text: M SALT (Michigan Salted) is a classified blend of salt, herbs and spices mixed to perfection for the taste you'll love time and time again. M SALT is perfect on steak, chicken, pork, beef, lamb, fish, vegetables, salads and more. M SALT is also great for seasoning sauces, soups and stews. Use M SALT when you are grilling, barbecuing, roasting or sauteing. Experience the flavor of M SALT for all your cooking needs. M SALT is gluten free and
